AzureBlade knew he had worried her.

AzureBlade: Please relax. You need to fear nothing from me. Perhaps I 
can help you find out who you are. I have some kind of talents that i 
could use. I can dive and help your spark find its way. Even if it 
turns out you are a Predacon, I will not hurt you nor will I try to 
modify your spark. I have sworn it and I still intend to uphold my 
word. But if you prefer to find another, I can help you find one.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<> AzureBlade displayed some sort of friendly smile. Of course, 
being 
> > totally transmetal did not help the motion, but he managed it.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: We are on prehistoric Earth. There is a war going on, 
and 
> > there is a battle not far from here. You can check your sensors 
for 
> > confirmation. I, however, am not implicated in this battle. I came 
> > here directly for you. I felt your spark and...
> > 
> > Suddenly he was out of words. How should he say this? Of course, 
he 
> > was a warrior, tall, strong and proud. How could he say anything 
> > without making her go crazy at him? This was the first time it 
> > happened to him.>>
> 
> Prehistoric Earth...was that where she was? And a war as well...that 
meant 
> there were more on this planet. In a way, she was glad...but in a 
way, she 
> had almost hoped not to discover such a thing. Was she to have to 
fight as 
> well? Without knowing what side she was on? Who her allies were? And 
her 
> enemies...what if AzureBlade turned out to be...
> 
> "I see.." she said quietly. At least she had nothing to fear from 
him yet. 
> Unless it turned out he was, she wouldn't consider him a threat..he 
didn't 
> seem to pose her any, as he'd said. She smiled slightly "Thank you."
> 
> > 
> > <<AzureBlade: The fact is I am a Maximal, and, if you would like, 
you 
> > can join my faction. By the way, what is your faction?>>
> 
> That was a question she had been somewhat dreading. "My faction? 
> Well..I...I'm not sure." Her ears flickered, annoyed at herself once 
again 
> "My memory was partially damaged somehow...I don't remember."
